alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fulton and southern Knox Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near London Mills, or 12 miles south of Galesburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gilson around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Maquon. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 55 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
